data.title: would the RunUpdatePause action of the editor be enhanced ?
data.body:
Hi
        When I use the editor action that play the scene, the objects are moving everywhere, and when I click the pause, they are place at where they are! 
        Would you please implements that resume the position and rotation and scale of the objects that before play? I must reopen the scene right now for solve the problem.
        By the way, how can I look at the scene through the Camera please? I can't determine the camera is set correct right now. 
       Thank you for your time!

data.title: Editor viewport camera settings
data.body: Per viewport camera settings window.

data.title: Add resource auto reloading to editor layouts
data.body:
If a layout is open and its dependent xml file is updated reload the layout.

If this is not that big a deal it would be nice.  Plus every minute a dev saves on ui programming an angel gets their wings.  My workflow for doing ui work with layouts usually includes a text editor and editor.

data.title: LoadAsync / LoadAsyncXML not working in lua
Color has wierd behavior when setting hsv/hsl values near 1/3, 2/3, 3/3
Glitchy animations with two instances of same AnimatedModel
data.body: Trying to implement "ghosting" of non-visible objects (as in Torchlight 2). Attempted a technique of having 2 instances of the player's AnimatedModel in a single node, in order to draw the ghost with a different material. When 2 instances of the same model are in place, animation is very glitchy and twitchy. It's mostly correct, just every half second or so it glitches a little bit then goes back to normal, too rapidly to really get a good view of exactly what kind of distortion is taking place.

data.title: Lua API generator for Zerobrane Studio IDE (http://studio.zerobrane.com/...
data.body:
...).

Based on and same usage as "ToDoxHook.lua" with tolua++ executable (See ./Bin/UpdateDocument).
- Overloaded methods supported (workaround as description);
- Inheritance supported (variables & methods).

data.title: Reduce warnings on iOS 64-bit build
data.body: The 64-bit build on this platform produces tons of warnings. To check if they could be suppressed.

data.title: Generic Octree?
data.body: Are there any plans to support a generic octree data structure? It's an extremely useful thing to have, but the current implementation seems to be heavily tied into the Drawable/Rendering subsystem.

data.title: Editor crashing after restoring from alt tabbing out of fullscreen while material editor is open
data.body:
Load up ninja snow wars
drop in a ninja
edit his material
alt tab out
restore
crash

data.title: Per Drawable Shader Parameters
data.body: Could we look at implementing per drawable shader params as discussed in #147.

data.title: remove shameful editor bubblesort
data.body: I don't know what kind of person puts in an unimproved bubblesort, but thank goodness I am here to the save the day.

data.title: Get rid of some warnings when loading the editor
data.body:
Playing some warning wack-a-mole.

Thanks,
Chris

data.title: Drawable::IsInView() behaviour with shadows
data.body:
The overload Drawable::IsInView(unsigned frameNumber), which is used also for the scripting property inView, will return true if the drawable has been rendered in at least one shadow map, but is otherwise occluded or outside viewport, which is a bit illogical.

Investigate whether this is possible to fix without undue runtime overhead.

data.title: Do not crash when cloning components without attributes.
Shared lib build support
data.body: It should be made possible to configure a shared library build as well as a static build.

data.title: Unknown CMake command "define_source_files".
data.body:
I just got this error.  Its for an out of source build static linking to msvc binaries.

```
C:\Users\Chris\Desktop\DungeonGenerator>cmake -E chdir Build cmake -Wno-dev -G "
Visual Studio 10" VERSION=10 ..\Source
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:11 (include):
  include could not find load file:

    Urho3D-CMake-magic

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:18 (define_source_files):
  Unknown CMake command "define_source_files".
```

data.title: Added Lua script compiler in Utilities folder
Editor orthographic camera & switch to zoom for mousewheel
data.body:
I added orthographic support to the editor and switch the mouse wheel to use zoom instead of moving the camera.  The zoom works well in both perspective and orthographic modes.  To toggle the camera mode press numpad 5.  I also added a little status bar at the bottom of every viewport to show the position and zoom of the camera.  The plan is to switch position to text boxes, add rotation, add a reset button, and a toggle for othographic, and presets for front/side/top.  If you would like to hold on until I finish those things that perfectly fine by me.

Thanks :heart: :heart:

data.title: Fixed ComponentAdded event.
Instance alpha-blended materials
data.body: Currently each alpha-blended object will be rendered as a separate draw call. Alpha draw calls with the same material/lights and in a consecutive distance range should be possible to combine into instance batches, similar to opaque draw calls.

data.title: Use xml for precached shader will better.
data.body:
I think use xml file for precached shader will better, like this.

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<PrecachedShaders>
    <Shader vsName="Shadow" vsDefines="SKINNED" psName="Shadow" psDefines="" />
</PrecachedShaders>
```

data.title: Fix for vegetation vertex shader variable naming typo (GLSL)
data.body:
Discovered that the vegetation shader (swaying in the wind vertex shader) had a wrong variable name in it that was probably forgotten in the shader refactoring project. This version is working (for me at least).

Before:
![before](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/143604/2181078/f7df813e-9741-11e3-9fe5-6e8cca533897.png)

After:
![after](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/143604/2181080/00cbb4e8-9742-11e3-9cec-202b269060ae.png)

Note that the same problem might exist in the HLSL shaders - I have not looked at those.

data.title: Build on 64-bit linux
data.body: Is there any plans to fix x64 build in linux?

data.title: Angelscript nested GetNode doesn't have vars
data.body:
If i have a Node and get a node from the vars collection

Node@ node1 = parent.vars["NEAR NODE"].GetNode()

And then ask for another node from the new node

Node@ node2 = node1.vars["NEAR NODE"].GetNode();

The node2 is null because the vars collection isn't sent down or initialized. At least this is what i am experiencing.

data.title: Angelscript XMLElement SetVariantVector
MinGW cross-compile toolchain
data.body:
... for cross compiling Urho3D for Windows on a Linux system.

I've written a section in the Readme describing the steps needed to enable this. But it mostly boils down to installing MinGW, and setting the MINGW_PREFIX environment variable before invoking cmake_gcc.sh.

data.title: No randomness in Random() function
data.body: It's really strange but using the Random() function I always get exactly the same random values. For example, most of the samples use the Random() function and I invariably get the same scenes. In lua I've tried to switch to math.random() but same results.

data.title: Improve WorkItem pool as based on discussions in #189
data.body:
Removed a number of O(n) searches by removing the reliance on the item existing in the pool list but adding a private bool flag visible to WorkItem or WorkQueue (via friend class) to check if its part of the internal pool to know whether it needs to be allocated back to the pool when purging complete items.
#189

data.title: Overminddl1 inputchanges
data.body: Added in support for raw keycode values in to the previously unused keysym field (now renamed raw).  Adds a P_RAW to the Urho3D variant field for keyboard calls.  Looks like extra mouse buttons are already supported but not tested yet, will later and if any issues will submit another pull request for those.
